threats.name: Drakwald Beastmen Raids
threats.description: Beastmen warbands have begun striking waystations along the Drakwald edge.
known_facts: Three supply caravans went missing in the last fortnight.
Tracks point toward the Drakwald forest.
event_chain: Waystations attacked and supply lines disrupted.
Large warband gathers for a raid on a major town.

threats.name: Greenskin Muster
threats.description: Orc clans are rumored to be rallying in the Grey Mountains foothills.
known_facts: Scout sightings report smoke signals beyond the passes.
Local militias report missing hunting parties.
event_chain: A unified force besieges a frontier keep.
Major battle in open terrain with heavy losses.
